rooms.description: Open-plan living area with ample natural light, Vastu compliant layout to promote positive energy flow.
Adjacent to the kitchen, designed for communal dining and interaction. Features eco-friendly materials and energy-efficient lighting.
Fully equipped eco-friendly kitchen with sustainable appliances and a layout that adheres to Vastu principles by being placed in the northeast direction for prosperity.
Spacious master bedroom with east-facing window to harness natural light. Incorporates eco-friendly insulation and sustainable materials.
Comfortable child's bedroom with natural lighting from the south-west, designed for energy efficiency and safety.
Dedicated home office space located in the northwest to ensure concentration, enhanced with natural ventilation and eco-friendly finishes.

openings.description: Main entrance aligned with Vastu principles to invite positivity.
Large east-facing windows for optimal morning light and passive solar heating, promoting energy efficiency.
Doorway connecting living area to outdoor patio, enhancing airflow and natural ventilation.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom with west-facing windows for balanced energy flow, designed following eco-friendly principles.
Well-designed bathroom incorporating low-flow fixtures and sustainable materials to conserve water and energy.

openings.description: Staircase connecting ground floor and first floor with non-toxic, recycled material finishes.

rooms.description: Eco-friendly rooftop terrace for relaxation and social gatherings. Includes a small vegetable garden adhering to Vastu principles.

openings.description: Access to the swimming pool deck, designed with energy-efficient materials and natural ventilation.
Sustainable swimming pool integrated with eco-friendly water recycling systems and natural landscaping.
